Question: Shenzhen Daran New Energy Technology Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Shenzhen Daran New Energy Technology Co., Ltd.

Product: DN Series Portable Power Station

- Lithium iron phosphate batteries
- Bi-directional fast charging
- High power solar charging
- High power UPS function
- Support for multiple units in parallel capability
- Charge capacity of 2073.6Wh and 648,000mAh for DN2000
- Parallel capacity technology, fast charging technology, and parallel machine display
- UPS function, 110V/220V automatic switching, smart inverter system
- Aesthetically pleasing, light and compact design
- Professional after-sales service
- Safety and reliability throughout the product's life cycle
- Complete channel price system
- Full scene coverage application
- Quality management system and comprehensive testing
- Customization services available
- Products have CE, FCC, UL, and PSE certificates
- Warranty period ranges from 1 to 5 years
- Ability to power most household appliances
- In-house development of core components
- OEM & ODM services available
Summary_cn:
深圳达然新能源科技有限公司。

产品：DN系列便携式电源站

- 铁锂磷酸电池
- 双向快速充电
- 高功率太阳能充电
- 高功率UPS功能
- 多机并联能力支持
- DN2000的充电容量为2073.6Wh和648,000mAh
- 并联容量技术、快速充电技术和并联显示
- UPS功能、110V/220V自动切换、智能逆变系统
- 美观、轻便、紧凑的设计
- 专业的售后服务
- 全程产品的安全性和可靠性
- 完整的渠道价格体系
- 全方位覆盖应用场景
- 质量管理体系和全面测试
- 提供定制服务
- 产品拥有CE、FCC、UL、PSE证书
- 保修期为1至5年
- 能够为大多数家用电器供电
- 自主开发核心部件
- 提供OEM和ODM服务
